/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -pthread -g   CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/geometry/vec3.cpp.o CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/shapes/sphere.cpp.o CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/material/dielectric.cpp.o CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/shapes/moving_sphere.cpp.o CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/shapes/rectangle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/basic_ray_tracer.dir/material/material.cpp.o  -o basic_ray_tracer
